projects.name: Thai-Bad-Words
details: Contributed to a TypeScript library for detecting Thai bad words.
Optimized search performance by refactoring the data structure to use a Trie.
Implemented unit testing with Jest to enhance code reliability.

projects.name: Goscanner
details: Developed a high-performance network scanning tool in Go.
Implemented multiple scan techniques Ex. SYN, FIN, ACK, XMAS, and UDP scans.

projects.name: CodingType
details: Developed a web application for testing typing speed in various programming language syntaxes.
Built with Svelte and TailwindCSS, featuring a minimalistic and user-friendly interface.
Inspired by Monkeytype, offering customizable typing tests with real-time words-per-minute tracking.

projects.name: Valentine Roses
details: Developed a web application for sending virtual roses to loved ones on Valentine's Day.
Built with Next and TailwindCSS, featuring a responsive design and intuitive user interface.
Integrated with Firebase for real-time database updates and user authentication.

projects.name: Reverse Shell Generator
details: Developed a command-line tool in Go to generate reverse shell commands across multiple programming languages and shells.
Implemented features supporting Bash, Python, PHP, PowerShell, and Netcat, enhancing versatility for various environments.

projects.name: Lynx
details: Enhanced the Lynx project's .gitignore file by adding rules to exclude auto-generated files, particularly Gradle build artifacts.​

technologies.details: ReactJS, NextJS, NestJS, SvelteJS, AstroJs, Fiber, Echo, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, React Native
AWS, GCP, Firebase, Vercel, Github Actions, CloudFlare

details: Co-developed a responsive website for business using Next.js and TailwindCSS
Co-developed a Backend API for a business using NestJS and MongoDB

educations.head: B.Sc. Infomation Technology
educations.details: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi, TH. 2024-Present (GPA 3.70)
